name: Princess Showdown
description:
Follow Rose as she attempts to escape her rival Serena's dungeon! Use her two magic forms to your advantage as you defeat enemies and jump over hazards in your quest for liberty!

A small but fun platformer game made for IGMC 2018. It is still in development, but right now exists as a proof of concept to show its potential.

This game is best played with a gamepad, but a keyboard can be used too. To go to the next step in a dialogue, press the Z key or the A button (or the equivalent on a non-xbox controller)
